shnitsel.rd
===========

.. py:module:: shnitsel.rd

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module contains functions that accept an RDKit.Chem.Mol object;
   but *not* necessarily functions that *return* a Mol object.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   shnitsel.rd.set_atom_props
   shnitsel.rd.mol_to_numbered_smiles
   shnitsel.rd.highlight_pairs


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: set_atom_props(mol, **kws)

.. py:function:: mol_to_numbered_smiles(mol)

.. py:function:: highlight_pairs(mol, pairs)
